description: This mockneck pullover is crafted from soft stretch jersey and embroidered with our signature embroidered Pony. At the back collar, it features a logo print.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 31" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, a 57" chest, and a 37" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 0.75" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 33" body length (front and back), a 23" shoulder, a 28.5" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 0.75" between sizes.
Mesh-lined mockneck. "Polo" printed at the back of the collar. Quarter-zip placket.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
